input_text:
Job Title: Frontend Developer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Software Tester (QA) - Remote, USA
About RTeams:RTeams is a forward-thinking software development company committed to delivering innovative solutions that drive success and efficiency for our clients. Specializing in web and mobile application development, we leverage the latest technologies to create products that meet the high expectations of our users. As we continue to expand our capabilities, we are seeking a dedicated Software Tester to ensure our software products are of the highest quality. This full-time, remote position is open to candidates across the United States, offering flexible working hours between 9-5pm or 10-6pm. RTeams offers both contract and regular employment options, focusing on finding the ideal match for our team and the successful candidate.
Your Role:As a Software Tester at RTeams, you will play a critical role in our development process, ensuring that our software products are robust, reliable, and ready for market. Your primary responsibilities will include designing and implementing tests, debugging, and defining corrective actions. You will also review system requirements and track quality assurance metrics (e.g., defect densities and open defect counts).
Key Responsibilities:Review and analyze system specifications to develop effective testing strategies and plans.Execute test cases (manual or automated) and analyze results to report and document technical issues.Evaluate product code according to specifications.Create logs to document testing phases and defects.Conduct post-release/post-implementation testing.Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle.
Technical Requirements:Proven experience as a Software Tester or similar role.Familiarity with Agile frameworks and regression testing.Ability to document and troubleshoot errors.Working knowledge of test management software (e.g., qTest, Zephyr) and SQL.Experience with automated testing tools is a plus.Excellent communication skills.Attention to detail and a passion for quality.
Experience:2+ years of experience in software testing or quality assurance.Demonstrated experience in developing effective testing plans and identifying defects in software products.Experience working in a remote setting and collaborating with distributed teams.
Who You Are:A problem solver with a keen eye for detail and a commitment to excellence.Able to work independently, managing your workload effectively in a remote setting.Strong communicator, capable of effectively articulating technical issues and working collaboratively with a distributed team.Passionate about software quality and continuous improvement.
Join Us:At RTeams, you’ll be part of a dynamic company that values innovation, quality, and the positive impact of technology. Enjoy the flexibility of remote work across the US, with standard working hours that support a healthy work-life balance. Here, we believe in empowering our employees to excel and make a significant impact.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.title: Frontend Developer
job_responsibilities: Review and analyze system specifications to develop effective testing strategies and plans.
Execute test cases (manual or automated) and analyze results to report and document technical issues.
Evaluate product code according to specifications.
Create logs to document testing phases and defects.
Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle.
output_json.company_information: RTeams is a forward-thinking software development company committed to delivering innovative solutions that drive success and efficiency for our clients. Specializing in web and mobile application development, we leverage the latest technologies to create products that meet the high expectations of our users.

other.content: Proven experience as a Software Tester or similar role. Familiarity with Agile frameworks and regression testing. Ability to document and troubleshoot errors. Working knowledge of test management software (e.g., qTest, Zephyr) and SQL. Experience with automated testing tools is a plus. Excellent communication skills. Attention to detail and a passion for quality.

2+ years of experience in software testing or quality assurance. Demonstrated experience in developing effective testing plans and identifying defects in software products. Experience working in a remote setting and collaborating with distributed teams.

A problem solver with a keen eye for detail and a commitment to excellence. Able to work independently, managing your workload effectively in a remote setting. Strong communicator, capable of effectively articulating technical issues and working collaboratively with a distributed team. Passionate about software quality and continuous improvement.

At RTeams, you’ll be part of a dynamic company that values innovation, quality, and the positive impact of technology. Enjoy the flexibility of remote work across the US, with standard working hours that support a healthy work-life balance. Here, we believe in empowering our employees to excel and make a significant impact.
